++ The_Master_Of_Athens

Story.
Synopsis:
George and Soula are summoned by Palomedes to treat the Governor of Athens' daughter. Someone has poisoned her with Belladonna.

Cast:
George, Soula
Palomedes [MasterOfAthens]
Argos the coach driver

Bey Mustafa [Mustafa_ali_Bey] governor of Athens
Mustafa's second wife [Fatma]
Her Daughter [Yeshmin](Jasper), who was poisoned with belladonna and nearly died.

Her servant [Maria_LadysMaid] who is 30 and speaks reasonable Turkish
Kitchenhand [Cassa_Kitchenhand] who squished the berries and also nearly died
